landing.heroTitle: See how sleep, money, and focus connect — decide from your own data
landing.heroBody: For anyone who tracks life in journals and spreadsheets: one place to log health, finance, productivity, and learning, then spot trends and correlations. Make better choices, not guesswork.
landing.freeNote: Free sign-up and core dashboard. Premium plans (deeper analytics, integrations) coming soon.
landing.socialText: Join others who track their life data

onboarding.body2: Add your first entry to get started — for example, log today's sleep and energy in Health.

legal.privacyIntro: LifePulse ("we", "our") respects your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our service.
legal.privacyCollect: We collect the information you provide when registering (email, name) and the data you enter in the app (health, finance, productivity, learning entries). We use this to provide the dashboard and analytics.
legal.privacyUse: Your data is used to display your dashboard, charts, and insights. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
legal.privacySecurity: We use industry-standard measures to protect your data. Access to the app is secured with authentication.
legal.contactUs: For questions, contact us at the address provided in the app or on the website.
legal.termsIntro: By using LifePulse you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.
legal.termsUse: LifePulse is a personal analytics dashboard. You must provide accurate information when registering and are responsible for keeping your account secure.
legal.termsAcceptable: You may not use the service for illegal purposes or to harm others. We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
legal.termsDisclaimer: The service is provided "as is". We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability or that the analytics are suitable for any particular purpose.
